text: Helena is the capital city of the U.S. state of Montana. It is also the county seat of Lewis and Clark County. About 32,000 people lived there in 2020. Surrounding features include Spring Meadow Lake State Park, Lake Helena, Helena National Forest, the Big Belt Mountains, the Gates of the Mountains Wilderness, the Missouri River, Canyon Ferry Lake, Holter Lake, Hauser Lake, and the Elkhorn Mountains. ==Notable people== * Max Baucus, former U.S. Senator * Liz Claiborne, fashion designer"Liz Claiborne" NNDB.com"Fashion guru Liz Claiborne dies" Breaking News.ie, July 26, 2007 * Mike Cooney, Lt. Governor of Montana * Charles Donnelly, president of the Northern Pacific Railway * Myrna Loy, actress * Charley Pride, country music singer ==References== ==Other websites== *City of Helena official website Category:Cities in Montana Category:County seats in Montana Category:State capitals in the United States Category:1864 establishments in the United States Category:1860s establishments in Montana Territory
title: Helena, Montana
